options.name: Two-Weapon Fighting
options.description: You have learned to fight effectively with a simple melee weapons in each hand. Gain +1 skill with coordination. When dual wielding, your offhand attacks roll with only a single penalty dice.

options.name: Action : Disengaging Strike
options.description: You attack with your offhand weapon while using your main weapon to defend. Make an offhand attack and immediately move up to 3 units. Until the start of your next turn, reroll any deflection or evasion dice that land on the 1 face.

options.name: Action : Synchronized Strikes
options.description: You coordinate both weapons in a devastating combination. Until the end of your turn, your weapon damage cannot be reduced by physical mitigation.

options.name: Stamina
options.description: You have adpated to the stamina requirements for swinging two weapons in compbat. Gain +1 skill with fitness and +1 maximum energy.

options.name: Weapon Finesse
options.description: Wielding two weapons has improved your footwork, allowing you to dance around your enemies' strikes. Gain +1 skill with evasion

options.name: Inpenetrable Defense
options.description: You utilize your dual weapons to create an impenetrable defense. Gain +1 skill with deflection.

options.name: Weapon Master
options.description: Your mastery of light weapons has reached professional levels. Gain +1 skill with simple melee weapons.

options.name: Reaction : Cross Block
options.description: In response to being targeted by a melee attack, you cross both weapons to block. Make a deflection check with a bonus dice. If you successfully deflect the attack, instead of taking half damage from a deflection check without a shield, you take none.

options.name: Reaction : Dual Opportunity
options.description: In response to a creature leaving or enterting a tile adjacent to you, you make an attack with both your main and offhand

options.name: Ambidextrous
options.description: You have achieved perfect coordination with both hands. You no longer have a penalty dice when making offhand attacks, rolling with your full talent. Additionally, you can make up to 2 offhand attacks per turn instead of the normal limit of 1.
